omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
			ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.CDSActivityDate
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	order by
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: condition_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Accident and Emergency Diagnosis to OMOP Condition Concept IDs

dataSource.name: AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis
dataSource.description:
ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY DIAGNOSIS is a six character code, comprising:
					Diagnosis Condition	n2
					Sub-Analysis	n1
					ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL AREA	n2
					ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY ANATOMICAL SIDE

omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
			ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.CDSActivityDate
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	order by
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: condition_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `condition` domain.

omopColumns.name: condition_start_date
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
			ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.CDSActivityDate
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	order by
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: condition_start_datetime
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
			ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.CDSActivityDate
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	order by
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: condition_end_date
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
			ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.CDSActivityDate
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	order by
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: condition_end_datetime
omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
			ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.CDSActivityDate
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	order by
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.CDSActivityDate

omopColumns.name: condition_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select
		distinct
			d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
			ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
			ae.NHSNumber,
			ae.CDSActivityDate
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_diagnosis d
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on d.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	order by
		d.AccidentAndEmergencyDiagnosis,
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		ae.CDSActivityDate
